summary:
Life not to depend on potions. 
 For all players, especially hunters and magicians.
 Sweet foods restore Magicka.^^
descriptionHtml:
Name: Valuable Foods and Misc
Version: 1.0
Date: 17/03/2012
Author: m0m

Description
===========
This MOD coordinates the value and the effect of food or crops as follows.

+ The useful effect of all foods are strengthened to have the life that your player character does not depend on potions.
+ Five new recipes are added to cooking. 
+ You can cook Baked Potatoes and Grilled Leeks.
+ The value of furs, meats, tusks and foods, the dishes go up it so that your player character has life by hunting and collection.
+ You can loot antler, tusk, eye by two at hunting.
+ You can also loot two Giant\'s Toes.
+ Chickens come to lay an egg.
+ Value of silverwares is raised.
+ FoodRestoreHealthDuration was corrected.
+ The names of the items were changed clearly.

Have fun!


Install
=======
Simply extract to the ..\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\ folder.
Then, enable \"Valuable Foods and Misc.esp\" in the Skyrim launcher.


Uninstall
=========
Simply delete following file.
\"..\\Skyrim\\Data\\Valuable Foods and Misc.esp\"


Release Info
============
v1.0 (17/03/2011) - Initial release


License Info

author: m0m
